sources.title: Klippers | FULL MOVIE | Crime, Action (2018)
sources.description:
A ruthless loan shark (Kevin Nash) commissions Steven (Ofu Obekpa) to kill his ex-wife (Libby Blanton) for the repayment of his debt.

Kevin Nash, Libby Blanton, Ofu Obekpa, Conphidance, Robert Pralgo, Francine Locke, Omer Mughal
Directed by Ofu Obekpa
2018

Edited for YouTube ad standards

metadata.Plot: An assassin is sent by his psychotic employer, to kill his ex-wife. In his quest to accomplish his task, he becomes familiar with his target, making his mission difficult. Now, he must face the consequences of his actions.
